Package Client

Class EkrutClient

java.lang.Object
ocsf.AbstractClient
Client.EkrutClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class EkrutClient extends AbstractClient
This class extends the AbstractClient class from the OCSF framework which means this is our client which communicate with our server, the purpose of this class is to maintain connection with the server ,send and receive messages from the server and transferring the information from the UI controllers to the server and back to the UI controllers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    connectToServer(String serverIp, String port, javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method start an instance o the EkrutClient and establish a connection to the server
    void
    handleMessageFromClientUI(ServerMessage msg)
    This method sends requests to the server with an instance of ServerMessage
    protected void
    handleMessageFromServer(Object msg)
    This method is an override method from the abstract client of OCSF , this method gets invoked every time a message (instance of ServerMessage) is sent from the server, it main purpose is to deal with each message according to their Instruction in the ServerMessage using the data the message carries.
    private void
    resetController()
    This method reset the wanted controllers (mostly used on logout)

  • Method Details

    • handleMessageFromServer

      protected void handleMessageFromServer(Object msg)
      This method is an override method from the abstract client of OCSF , this method gets invoked every time a message (instance of ServerMessage) is sent from the server, it main purpose is to deal with each message according to their Instruction in the ServerMessage using the data the message carries.
      Specified by:
      handleMessageFromServer in class AbstractClient
      Parameters:
      msg - the message sent.

    • resetController

      private void resetController()
      This method reset the wanted controllers (mostly used on logout)

    • connectToServer

      public static void connectToServer(String serverIp, String port, javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method start an instance o the EkrutClient and establish a connection to the server
      Parameters:
      serverIp - the server IP to connect to
      port - the port to connect to on the server IP
      event - the ActionEvent click on connect in the client connect screen

    • handleMessageFromClientUI

      public void handleMessageFromClientUI(ServerMessage msg)
      This method sends requests to the server with an instance of ServerMessage
      Parameters:
      msg - the ServerMessage we want to send
